function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Detection limit of the method not optimized for lower incidence levels","Impact":"Inability to detect early cases of COVID-19 in the wastewater, leading to delayed public health response","Mitigation":"Optimize the method's sensitivity and precision to detect lower incidence levels","Technologies":"Improvement of RT-qPCR method sensitivity and precision","People":"Researchers, public health officials","Owner":"Research institutions, public health agencies"},{"Description":"Variability in catchment area sizes and wastewater flow","Impact":"Differences in wastewater flow and catchment area size may affect the accuracy of surveillance results","Mitigation":"Standardize sampling and measurement protocols across different catchment areas","Technologies":"Standardized wastewater sampling and measurement equipment","People":"Field technicians, researchers","Owner":"Public health agencies, research institutions"},{"Description":"Correlation between measured SARS-CoV-2 load and estimated COVID-19 cases","Impact":"Reliance on accurate measurement of SARS-CoV-2 load in wastewater to estimate COVID-19 cases may introduce inaccuracies","Mitigation":"Develop and validate models to more accurately estimate COVID-19 cases from SARS-CoV-2 load in wastewater","Technologies":"Data modeling and validation techniques","People":"Data analysts, epidemiologists","Owner":"Research institutions, public health agencies"}]}
